name: Counting Frenzy
description:
Title: Counting Frenzy

Platform: Print to Play

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, Casual Gaming

Game Overview: In this exciting card game, players can develop their addition skills while also having fun. In this game, players must end up with the most addition pairs in order to be victorious. Players of all ages can play this game as they try to do math quickly and efficiently. 

Instructions: Download the print-to-play instructions for more information. 

Game Design Team: Sofia Linthicum- Game Designer
